charges.charge_description: In case CR. 87-00230-01, USA v. Israel Ramos Santiago before U.S. District Court for Judicial District of Massachusetts-Petition on Probation &; Supervised Release dated 10/29/97 cites violations of supervised release: Violation #6, defendant shall notify the probation officer within 72 hours of any change of residence or employment; Violation #2, defendant shall report to the probation office as directed by the court and probation office and shall submit a truthful and complete written report within first 5 days of each month.
